sentences.en: "Frankly I found it rather frightening." — "A little startling," Mark agreed.
sentences.cn: “坦白说我觉得这相当可怕。”——“是有点吓人，”马克表示同意。

sentences.en: After the quietness of home and school, university had been almost frightening.
sentences.cn: 过惯了家庭和中学的平静生活之后, 大学简直有些可怕了.

sentences.en: Bullying can indeed be distressing and frightening for those at the receiving end.
sentences.cn: 受到欺凌的人会真实地感到痛苦和害怕。

sentences.en: But the truly frightening thing was the emaciation of his body.
sentences.cn: 但是最吓人的还是身体羸弱的程度.

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: Going into hospital can be very frightening for a child.
sentences.cn: 去医院对小孩子来说可能是很可怕的。

sentences.en: His heart bumped in his breast with frightening loudness.
sentences.cn: 他的心在胸膛里怦怦怦地跳啊跳,声音响得好吓人.

sentences.en: I had a frightening encounter with a poisonous snake.
sentences.cn: 我曾意外地遇到过一条毒蛇,吓得我要命.

sentences.en: It was a very frightening experience and they were very courageous.
sentences.cn: 那是一次让人胆战心惊的经历，而他们表现得非常勇敢。

sentences.en: It was a very unpleasant and frightening attack.
sentences.cn: 那是一次非常恶劣且骇人的攻击。

sentences.en: It was the most frightening experience of my life.
sentences.cn: 这是我一生中最可怕的经历。

sentences.en: It's frightening to think it could happen again.
sentences.cn: 想到此事可能再次发生就使人不寒而栗。

sentences.en: The idea of death is frightening to most people.
sentences.cn: 死的想法对于大多数人都是可怕的.

sentences.en: The mask was so lifelike it was quite frightening.
sentences.cn: 该面具非常逼真以至看起来有点恐怖.

sentences.en: The most frightening thing of all was that not a sound could be heard.
sentences.cn: 最为吓人的事情是一点声音也听不到.

sentences.en: The whole car shuddered with an almost frightening surge of power.
sentences.cn: 油门猛然加大到几乎让人恐惧的程度，整个汽车剧烈震颤着。
